topic.title: Now Available: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1977–1980, Volume XIX, South Asia
topic.body: This volume is part of a Foreign Relations subseries that documents the most important foreign policy issues of the Jimmy Carter administration. This volume documents the Carter administration’s approach to the South Asia region in response to the shifting political landscape at the end of the 1970s.
topic.image-description: Book Cover of Foreign Relations of the United States, 1977-1980, Volume XIX, South Asia
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
